While creative and interesting the game lacks replay value and has warped into one of those games that can allow money to be dumped into it in the form of in game currency. While others may be ok with this, I am not. These purchases are seperate from the DLC packs for killers and survivors which I am ok with. However the new additions never bring much more original content (for example Haddonfeild is just an overgrown mess of similar houses rather than an actual "map"). On the topic of maps, these are detailed and beautiful but lack many distinctions between areas as in a lot of the map looks just like any other part of the map and is not uniquely recognizable.

The method of the hunt is pretty much the same also and do not give killers such as Michael Meyers and Freddy Krueger their own real style. Just hook and move on. while this may have been a cool idea for the first initial 5 charachters  i feel they have poached too many much more developed killers and put them in this cookie cutter mold.

The game lacks a method to engage friends and the killers together, (their is no in game proximity chat) so you rely on alternate, less suitable methods of chat.

Player base toxicity should never be included in a review as this is 2020 and every single game (except rare niche ones aimed for adults that kids will not enjoy) will have. Also IMO you should ignore any reviews concerning killer/survivor balance as this is almost always in the eye of the player themselves and everyones opinion will differ.

I try to give this game an honest review and have owned it in beta, and own it on all three major platforms since i mainly use the xbox and the game is the same across all platforms. I want to like this game, i really do as i am a huge horror fan, however I just cant honestly recommend it unless you just have the money and dont really care if you spend it for a game you might not want to play after a week or so. Matchmaking can be somewhat slow at times also if you are running in the public lobby.

I hate to try and compare it to another game as the two are really different games all together, however Friday the 13th is the closet counterpart to this game you will find. Recommending Friday the 13th now is up in the air as its in its waning years, however to give you some idea if you have played it, the things you will notice about this game as a new buyer that might disappoint you will be a few things, such as lack of feeling the charachters and maps are designed to make you feel if you were in the movies, the objectives are more tedious than a fun item finding mission, also the lack of in game chat and a faster pace will make this game more of a "rat race" challenge and not give you any laid back silly fun (something i liked so much about the F13 game). On the flip side this game is more stable, has less buggy map areas and interactions and is still being maintained while friday the 13th just hit EOL where the developers pulled the servers and reverted back to pier to pier to keep the game playable by those who own it.

I am allowing comments on this review, anyone that can offer potential buyers more insight after playing more than 50 so hours only (for me on xbox so ignore the low count on steam) feel free to do so, but please keep it peaceful and friendly.

作为一个逃生者玩家，10段以下都是屠夫占据绝对优势的。屠夫这个段位难的无非就是找不找到人的问题，但是一但发现人基本都跑不掉。屠夫上手难度不知道比人类容易多少，杀手可以失误无数次，人类一次也不能失误。有时候都想从箱子掏出枪给屠夫一枪。人类运气好的可以在安全板绕一下，运气不好一片地方都没有板。我只想问问官方地图的设计是否合理，有些墙角拐角莫名出现石块钩子草垛直接卡膜，一般普通玩家45秒左右就会倒，如果被针对根本就毫无游戏体验。10段以上才会出现人屠博弈的现象，以下基本全靠马拉松拖时间，屠夫带个一刀杀基本都能杀3个。设定本来就不能对屠夫反击，可是为什么不在地图上下功夫呢。为什么同是对地图不熟悉屠夫就可以无视这些因素。如果愿意我希望杀机这个游戏都不要有逃生者玩家了，全玩杀手去吧，最后搞个杀手互殴的模式，还要什么逃生者呢。你说谁喜欢被砍呢，谁不喜欢砍别人呢。玩了130小时跟刚玩没一点区别，杀手再怎么不会玩守尸一个也绝对能杀一个吧，但是人类里面一个不会玩基本可以3杀了。玩了130小时我现在只想退款了，真的玩不了了。匹配机制也是个问题，大厅邀请好友也是个问题，经常出现邀请不到人的情况，因为这个不重要你们就不优化了是吧。如果可以我想退款，哪怕只给我一半我也想退了。真心不推荐大家买这个游戏，别因为生化危机dlc就买，真的没必要。买了这个游戏我一直觉得我是傻逼。单边屠夫玩家不服去看看官方给的数据看看是人类赢得多还是屠夫，我也玩有屠夫刚玩第一把遇到紫段我也能杀两个，虽然这是在我玩了一段时间的人类。如果仍然有萌新想玩，我极力推荐玩小叮当，自己看看上手杀手能有多难。只要不玩护士，鬼武士，枯萎这种高难度的，基本30小时杀手就可以脱离萌新，基本可以进阶技术了。人类不玩个几百小时都入不了门，我真的想吐了，无视傻逼
